summary: Summary of ExperienceA long term professional Software Engineer with expertise in real time and embedded systems programming. Extensive experience in all phases of the software development life cycle, encompassing requirements gathering, R&D, design, programming, debugging, testing and maintenance. Excellent problem solving skills. Well rounded in the engineering field, which allows me to learn new technical areas fast and in depth. Key CompetenciesWell versed in all stages of software development life cycle (SDLC) from requirements analysis to maintenanceProficient in C, C++, C#, x86 assemblyWorking knowledge of Java, HTML, XMLExtensive background in designing, coding and testing complex multithreaded applications for different industriesSignificant experience in design and development of multiprocessor systems Excellent debugging and problem solving skillsExtensive engineering background that lets me understand and learn quickly necessary business environments.Broad background in mathematics, control theory and optimizationSuccessful in multidisciplinary teams.Outstanding debugging skills.Demonstrated high performance under pressure.Broad experience designing and developing specialized user interface components of real time applicationsProven ability to present complex designs and product features for audiences of different levels
